txt.en: Though the Easterling Men may step back from their alliance with Evil, now that the influence of Sauron has been dispelled, their Sorcerers among them remain deadly and zealous in dark dealings. Those within Rhûd Vorn therefore pose a threat within and without.
Defeated Easterling Sorcerers in Rhûd Vorn.
You defeated a number of sorcerers in Rhûd Vorn, ridding a corrupting and perilous threat from the Easterlings and from Gondor alike.
The Sorcerers in Rhûd Vorn are a corrupting and malign force, dangerous to the Easterlings and Gondor alike.
Defeat Easterling Sorcerers in Rhûd Vorn.
